mapper.insert: insert into poly_employee(employee_no, employee_name, password, department_id, enabled, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{employeeNo}, #{employeeName}, #{password}, #{departmentId}, #{enabled}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: select e.*, r.`id` as rid, r.`name`, r.`name_zh`, r.`gmt_create`, r.`gmt_modified` from poly_employee e, poly_employee_role er, poly_role r where e.`employee_no`=#{employeeNo} and e.`id` = er.`eid` and er.`rid` = r.`id`

select e.*, r.`id` as rid, r.`name`, r.`name_zh`, r.`gmt_create`, r.`gmt_modified` from poly_employee e, poly_employee_role er, poly_role r where e.`id`=#{eid} and e.`id` = er.`eid` and er.`rid` = r.`id`
